com.thinkaurelius.titan.core

Interface VertexList

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Iterable<TitanVertex>

    public interface VertexList
extends Iterable<TitanVertex>
    List of TitanVertexs.

    Basic interface for a list of vertices which supports retrieving individuals vertices or iterating over all of them, but does not support modification.

    VertexList is returned by TitanVertexQuery. Depending on how the query was executed that returned this VertexList, getting vertex idAuthorities might be significantly faster than retrieving vertex objects.

    Author:
    Matthias Bröcheler (http://www.matthiasb.com)

      Returns a list of idAuthorities of all vertices in this list of vertices in the same order of the original vertex list.
      int size()
      Returns the number of vertices in this list.
      void sort()
      Sorts this list according to vertex idAuthorities in increasing order.

    • Method Detail

      • size

        int size()
        Returns the number of vertices in this list.
        Returns:
        Number of vertices in the list.

      • get

        TitanVertex get(int pos)
        Returns the vertex at a given position in the list.
        Parameters:
        pos - Position for which to retrieve the vertex.
        Returns:
        TitanVertex at the given position

      • sort

        void sort()
        Sorts this list according to vertex idAuthorities in increasing order. If the list is already sorted, invoking this method incurs no cost.
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - If not all vertices in this list have an id

      • getIDs

        cern.colt.list.AbstractLongList getIDs()
        Returns a list of idAuthorities of all vertices in this list of vertices in the same order of the original vertex list.

        Uses an efficient primitive variable-sized array.

        Returns:
        A list of idAuthorities of all vertices in this list of vertices in the same order of the original vertex list.
        See Also:
        AbstractLongList

      • getID

        long getID(int pos)
        Returns the id of the vertex at the specified position
        Parameters:
        pos - The position of the vertex in the list
        Returns:
        The id of that vertex
